dmca.title: Great Wall of Copyright (#1)
dmca.body:
Nov. 12th, 2002
                                                                  [Private]  
                                      Xi'an International Studies University
                                                     Xi'an. Shaonxi, 710061
                                                 People's Republic of China
    
            Dear Google Editor,
    
            Hereunder, I, on bebalf of Travelchinaguide.com, the property of Xi'an Diamond Network Co,
            Ltd., would like to notify you a copyright infringement with part of our website content.
    
            The copyrighted work at issue is the texts that appear on:
    
            http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/scene/beijing/badaling.htm

            http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/scene/beijing/simatai.htm

	    http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/scene/beijing/jinshanling.htm

            http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/scene/beijing/gubelkou.htm

            http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/scene/beijing/mutianyu.htm

            http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/scene/beijing/jiankou.htm

            http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/scene/beijing/huanghua.htm

            http://www.travelchinaguide.com/china_great_wall/scene/beijing/juyongguan.htm

    
            The content of the above pages has been uploaded online for 17 months and has been in your
            index for at lease a year. We uploaded them in May, 2001 whereas the plagiary content was
            uploaded on May 11th, 2002. Our infringed content was composed by [private], a
            professorof Xi'an International Studies University. You may contact her at [private],
    
            Searcb queries and related infringing web pages that appear on the Google search result pages 
            are listed below.
    
            
            Search Query: Badaling great wall
	    Infringing Web Pages: www.chinahighlights.com/aboutus/news/greatwall/badaling.htm 

            Search Query: simatai great wall
	    Infringing Web Pages: www.chinahighlights.com/aboutus/news/greatwall/simatai.htm

            Search Query: jinshanling great wall
            Infringing Web Pages: www.chinahighlights.com/aboutus/news/greatwall/jinshanling.htm 

            Search Query: gubelkou great wall
            Infringing Web Pages: www.chinahighlights.com/aboutus/news/greatwall/gubelkou.htm

            Search Query: mutianyu great wall
            Infringing Web Pages: www.chinahighlights.com/aboutus/news/greatwall/mutianyu.htm

            Search Query: jiankou great wall
            Infringing Web Pages: www.chinahighlights.com/aboutus/news/greatwall/jiankou.htm 

            Search Query: huanghuacheng great wall
	    Infringing Web Pages: www.chinahighlights.com/aboutus/news/greatwall/huanghuacheng.htm

            Search Query: juyongguan great wall
            Infringing Web Pages: www.chinahighlights.com/aboutus/news/greatwall/juyongguan.htm  
         
    
            I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly 
            infringing web pages is not authorised by the copyright owner, Travelchinaguide.com, its agent, 
            or the law.
    
            We can be reached at [private] or [private]
    
            The plagiary can be reached at [private] or [private]
        
    
            I swear, under penalty of perjury that the information in the notification is correct and that I am
            authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
    
    Sincerely Yours,
    
    General Manager
    Travelchinaguide.com
